--- title: Core functions keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Basic functions that are to be reused in the while library." ---

ifnone[source]

ifnone(a, b)

b if a is None else a

Wraps the b if a is None else a condition for convenience.

is_listy[source]

is_listy(x)

Checks if an object is a tuple or a list.
